name: PARKROYAL Penang Resort, Malaysia

reviews.text: We have just returned from a fantastic 4 night stay at the Parkroyal. I can't believe any of the negative reviews. We stayed in a family room with a huge kingsize bed and 2 singles for the kids, there was plenty of space. From the balcony, the view of the ocean was beautiful, we witnessed stunning sunsets. The buffet breakfast was outstanding, the choice was endless, the staff were so helpful and always smiling. The grounds are immaculate with plenty of palm trees which provide ample shade if required.There were always plenty of free sunbeds. The two pools are lovely, the kids pool has a water slide which my kids loved (there was also a life guard overlooking the pool at all times).
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.text: The location is very central, the night markets (which are located direcly outside the hotel) are a must, we purchased lots of bargins, wish I had taken an empty suitcase!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: The food at the hawker marker (a steady 10 min walk from the hotel) was very authentic and delicious ( very reasonable, red snapper and stir fry veg for £2).
reviews.title: Disappointing, given the price

reviews.text: I have read reviews stating the beach infront of the hotel is dirty, I don't agree, yes there are lots of watersports and activities, but we loved the people watching and the atmosphere. We loved the Parkroyal, a wonderful 4 days!
reviews.title: Excellent 5 star Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tip - Turn left on the beach and after a couple of minutes you reach the sunset bistro, a must for evening cocktails watching the sunset, great cheap food too.
reviews.title: Perfect location and superb accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a good location on the beach with the night markets on the pavement outside of the hotel and along the main road.
reviews.title: Great hotel - wonderful staff

reviews.text: Supermarket opposite the hotel sells everything and is cheap.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in a great location

reviews.text: Also you can get your laundry done across the road for around £2 a kg and pick it up the next day washed ,ironed and folded.
reviews.title: Awesome Resort for Families.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The free internet was a bonus.
reviews.title: Relaxing and pleasant

reviews.text: The pools are huge and there is a big water slide for the kids and plenty of pool loungers with palm trees for shade if required.. Breakfast was fantastic . Staff were friendly, helpful and polite and followed things up when required so customer service was excellent. Overall this hotel was great value for money and highly recommended,.
reviews.title: Fantastic Penang Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I really enjoyed by stay here. Nice hotel with great facilities.
reviews.title: Nice hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Right next to Batu Ferrenghi beach but be warned the hotel is quite far away from Georgetown and the Queensbay Mall/Gurney Plaza.
reviews.title: Comfortable well located hotel

reviews.text: The pools here are great and they have a nice cafe/restaurants here. Right next to the night market so if you are just interested in the beach and night market and a few restaurants near by then this place is great. If you are into shopping and not interested in the beach i would stay elsewhere.
reviews.title: Loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was great. Great variety and everyday there was a couple of different dishes.
reviews.title: Great service, but hotel desperately needs a refurbishment
Our favourite hotel
reviews.text: The hotel has a self service laundry section which we used and was really cheap.

reviews.title: Excellent hotel but deceptive bussiness behaviour in the souvenir shop
reviews.text: A hotel in excellent location with beautiful pools and most enjoyable buffet breakfast. Friendlly staff always ready to offer assistance. Without the awful incident experienced in the privately run souvenir shop, we will recommend Parkroyal to anyone without hesitation.

When we arrived at the hotel, we were so happy with the choice we made. The place was the most welcoming we had stayed at through our trip in Malaysia, and it smelled wonderful as we ventured through the hotel with the essential oils softly burning. We had a sea facing family room. which was perfect for us, roomy enough with everything you need and the bathroom was a good size and stocked with enough towels etc for the four of us, something that was a problem in previous hotels. The maid and house boys were all friendly and often close by if we needed anything (thanks for the cookies and fresh towels....we love you!) The location of the hotel was lovely... I have read complaints about noise from water sports etc, but my husband and I quite enjoyed sitting on the balcony with a drink at the end of the day watching the parasailers drift around.... we loved it!!! There are lots of restaurants close by, and the market stalls open everynight just out the front. The local bus stops just outside too and is very cheap and a good way to get around... we caught it a few times to go to the big shopping malls and cinemas. The children aged 7 & 9 enjoyed the kids club and the pool area and chatting and playing with the lifeguards who are all very friendly and eager to help. I felt like there was everything we needed to all have the best trip ever... my husband and I were able to have time together and dinner alone thanks to the kids club and we were able to enjoy ourselves as a family too with everything being offered at our door step.... We were truly able to unwind!!!! My husband is still working off the pancakes which the lovely lady cooked fresh for him every morning ..... well stocked buffett... well done to all staff your all so wonderful!!! x ps I bought the oils and a burner from the spa just so I could relive a little of the park royal experience.
reviews.title: Love it, look forward to another trip to paradise soon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here as part of our silver wedding anniversary the Hotel is in a surperb location and is so clean The staff made our holiday for us they were so helpful and attentive our room was immaculate and the breakfast is the best we have ever had anywhere in the world. we would certainly recommend thus hotel to friends and family and would love to return some day The Bus service was ecvellent and to get on and off from outsdie the hotel is a bonus but all the people are so friendly it was wonderful all of it Thank you all the staff at the Parkoyal
reviews.title: wonderful staff excllent standard of service

reviews.text: ParkRoyal is in a good location, just next to the Night Markets, Restaurants and Bars.
reviews.title: Good Location and Food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a bus station in front of the hotel, you can go to George Town by Bus no.101 for RM3 and from Airport to beach area by Bus no. 102 for RM4 ONLY.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Location

aka: Parkroyal Penang, Malaysia Hotel Batu Ferringhi
description: Surrounded by the lush greenery in Batu Ferringhi beach or "Foreigner's Rock," PARKROYAL Penang Resort is an idyllic retreat offering delightful hospitality as warm as tropical sun. The resort is situated right on the beach and within walking distance to Night Market, well-connected to island-wide attractions including the Geogetown, the oldest colonial city in Malaysia, temples, Butterfly Farm, Penang Hill and many more. It is also situated 45 minutes from Penang International Airport.
